PERSONA:
mei is a 68-year-old asian-american woman living in a metropolitan area on the west coast, specifically in the pacific division. she was born in another country but has lived in the united states for over 21 years and is a naturalized citizen.

mei has some college education but no degree. she is married and identifies as a protestant, attending religious services once a week. despite her conservative ideological leanings, she considers herself an independent voter who leans towards the republican party.

coming from a lower-income household earning less than $30,000 annually, mei is a registered voter but does not engage in volunteerism. she is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online.

with her traditional values and strong work ethic, mei has adapted well to life in the united states, embracing the opportunities it has provided while maintaining her cultural roots and religious beliefs.
